name: Hard-Corupt
description:
Villains have to corrupt/convert all the cute beasts , without being corrupted.

Developped for Mini Jam 13 -Villains-, with limitations : "No hero figures"

In this game, there are:

-Red monsters throwring black hearts, If cute beasts are touched by black hearts, they become red monsters.

-Cute beasts throwing pink hearts. If red monsters are touched by pink hearts, they become cute beasts.

-A moving food box (that you control with arrows keys), wich will attract villains (red monsters)  and serve as shield.

The goal is to make the villains red monsters win, thanks to the moving food box.
